title: Condors: Giant Birds
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 194 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 500L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and Y
description: Condors are fascinating animals. This book explores the habitats, eating habits, appearance, and offspring of these giant birds. Vibrant images help bring this book to life.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
